SEARCH
Module mk.musiclibrarygui
Package mk.musiclibrarygui.controllers

Class MenuController

java.lang.Object
mk.musiclibrarygui.controllers.MenuController
public class MenuController extends Object
Controller for the main menu of the music library application. Manages navigation to different screens and application exit.
Version:
3.0
Author:
Michal Kaminski

    Button to exit the application.

    libraryButton
    Button to navigate to the music library screen.

    songList
    The list of songs to which the new song will be added.

  • Field Details

    • app

      private final App app
      Reference to the main application instance, used for managing scene transitions. This allows the controller to request navigation to different screens within the application.

    • songList

      private final SongList songList
      The list of songs to which the new song will be added.

    • creditsButton

      private javafx.scene.control.Button creditsButton
      Button to navigate to the credits screen.

    • libraryButton

      private javafx.scene.control.Button libraryButton
      Button to navigate to the music library screen.

    • exitButton

      private javafx.scene.control.Button exitButton
      Button to exit the application.

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuController

      public MenuController(SongList songList, App app)
      Constructs a MenuController with the specified song list and application instance. This controller manages the main menu screen of the application, facilitating navigation and access to various features within the application.
      Parameters:
      songList - The SongList instance containing all songs managed by the application
      app - The main App instance that oversees the application's lifecycle and navigation

  • Method Details

    • showAuthor

      private void showAuthor(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Navigates to the author screen when the author button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by clicking the author button
      Throws:
      IOException - if loading the author screen fails

    • showLibrary

      private void showLibrary(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Navigates to the music library screen when the library button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by clicking the library button
      Throws:
      IOException - if loading the music library screen fails

    • exit

      private void exit(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Exits the application when the exit button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by clicking the exit button

    • handleAuthorEvent

      private void handleAuthorEvent(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      Handles the keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+C) to navigate to the credits screen. Fires the credits button action when triggered.
      Parameters:
      event - the key event triggered by pressing Ctrl+C

    • handleLibraryEvent

      private void handleLibraryEvent(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      Handles the keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+L) to navigate to the music library screen. Fires the library button action when triggered.
      Parameters:
      event - the key event triggered by pressing Ctrl+L

    • handleExitEvent

      private void handleExitEvent(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      Handles the keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+E) to exit the application. Fires the exit button action when triggered.
      Parameters:
      event - the key event triggered by pressing Ctrl+E
